conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric conversion with clear wall height and interior shadowing.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect 3D transformation with clean cutaway geometry and consistent wall thickness.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout geometry is highly accurate; minor variance in exact wall thickness vs floor plan but adjacencies are perfect.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D layout almost exactly, including bathroom fixtures and kitchen counters.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean aesthetic; lighting provides excellent depth; no text contamination in the 3D render.

detected_errors.description: The balcony/closet door swing orientation in the top-left differs slightly from 2D plan.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D isometric conversion of the provided floor plan.
